d1e3.d: PK's wing bites are my FAVORITE food in Blacksburg! Combined with their homemade ranch and a side of fries this app can be turned into one, big, delicious meal!

d1e10.d: Sharkey's soft pretzels are absolutely delicious and melt in your mouth! The have the perfect balance between soft inside and golden brown, salty exterior.

d1e17.d: The Cellars Hot Legs are an absolute must-try and one of the best bang-for-your-buck apps in Blacksburg! These were the first food discovery I made as a freshman at Virginia Tech, and they've remained a personal favorite throughout the years.

d1e24.t: Where to Find the Best Appetizers in Blacksburg
d1e24.d: As a second semester senior, I feel my 4 years eating my way through Blacksburg makes me qualified to be your guide to the best apps in town. All of my recommendations are located in downtown Blacksburg and are all local to Southwest Virginia!

d1e31.d: One thing I am passionate about in life is queso - the perfect appetizer especially at Cabo Fish Taco. Their queso is my 2nd favorite queso of all time (Moes queso can't be topped and I stand by that!) It is more than just a dip
